result.name: official-register-of-driving-instructor-training
result.notes: Official Register of Driving Instructor Training (ORDIT) spreadsheet - contains contact and premises details of ORDIT accredited organisations and personal data relating to their employees including contact details, license and qualifications details.

organization.name: driving-standards-agency
organization.title: Driving Standards Agency
organization.description:
The Driving Standards Agency (DSA) was replaced by Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) in April 2014.

DSA was an executive agency, sponsored by the Department for Transport.

It existed from 1 April 1990 to 31 March 2014.

Find out more at https://www.gov.uk/dsa.

result.title: Official Register of Driving Instructor Training.
